stsjorbsmod:DimensionDoorPotion.NAME: Scroll of Dimension Door
DESCRIPTIONS: Ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to.

stsjorbsmod:GhostPoisonPotion.NAME: Ghost Poison
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%1$s #yManifest for each enemy, then win the combat. NL Does not work on Boss and Elite enemies.

stsjorbsmod:LiquidVirtue.NAME: Liquid Virtue
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #yClarity of two random #yVirtues you don't already have #yClarity of.
